00013 #include "DbjRecordManager.hpp"

00015 static const DbjComponent componentId = RunTime;

00018 // Konstruktor
00019 DbjIndexTupleIterator::DbjIndexTupleIterator(DbjIndexIterator *indexIter,
00020         const DbjTable *table)
00021     : indexIterator(indexIter), recordMgr(NULL),
00022       tableDesc(table), recTuple(NULL)
00023 {
00024     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00025 
00026     recordMgr = DbjRecordManager::getInstance();
00027     if (!indexIter || !tableDesc) {
00028         DBJ_TRACE_ERROR();
00029     }
00030     tableDesc->getTableId(tableId);
00031 }
00032 
00033 
00034 // Destruktor
00035 DbjIndexTupleIterator::~DbjIndexTupleIterator()
00036 {
00037     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00038 
00039     delete indexIterator;
00040     delete recTuple;
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 DbjErrorCode DbjIndexTupleIterator::getNextTuple(DbjTuple *&tuple)
00045 {
00046     DbjErrorCode rc = DBJ_SUCCESS;
00047     TupleId tupleId;
00048 
00049     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00050 
00051     // hole Tupel-ID
00052     rc = indexIterator->getNextTupleId(tupleId);
00053     if (rc != DBJ_SUCCESS) {
00054         DBJ_TRACE_ERROR();
00055         goto cleanup;
00056     }
00057 
00058     if (!recTuple) {
00059         recTuple = new DbjRecordTuple(tableDesc);
00060         if (!recTuple) {
00061             goto cleanup;
00062         }
00063     }
00064 
00065     {
00066         DbjRecord *record = NULL;
00067 
00068         rc = recordMgr->get(tableId, tupleId, record);
00069         if (rc != DBJ_SUCCESS) {
00070             DBJ_TRACE_ERROR();
00071             goto cleanup;
00072         }
00073 
00074         rc = recTuple->initialize(record, tableDesc);
00075         if (rc != DBJ_SUCCESS) {
00076             DBJ_TRACE_ERROR();
00077             goto cleanup;
00078         }
00079     }
00080 
00081     // setze Ergebnis
00082     tuple = recTuple;
00083 
00084  cleanup:
00085     return DbjGetErrorCode();
00086 }
